name: Impromptoop
description:
Here's a little prototype I had to do, apparently it's fun so I'm putting it here so that you can have a taste.

Controls: Drag on objects.
Oh and you can play on Mobile btw ;)

Oh and feel free to give me feedback, report bugs or even give me your ideas in the comments !

Also, if you didn't understand what the bubbles did, here's a list of their actions:

- Planet Aerth: Low Gravity (Temporary)

- Hourglass: Slow-Mo (Temporary) (not smooth but gets the job done)

- Ice: Stops the Hoop movement (Temporary)

- Duck +/-: Makes thrown stuff bigger/smaller (Permanent)

- Hoop +/-: Manes the Hoop bigger/smaller (Permanent)

- Hoop >>>/<<<: Makes the Hoop move faster/slower (Permanent)
